Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.resource

Class Resource

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.resource.Resource
Direct Known Subclasses:
ResourceCoin, ResourceFaith, ResourceJolly, ResourceServant, ResourceShield, ResourceStone, ResourceWhite
public abstract class Resource
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents the game's generic resource and marbles, used for the market and productions.
